1.title: 1st Barkday — Puppy year — rapid learning & socialization
1.expect: High curiosity, short attention span; socialization is key.
care: Vet consult on vaccines & parasite plan
1.short: Recall, stays, and social calm; add scent games.

2.title: 2nd Barkday — Late puppy — impulse control begins
2.expect: High curiosity, short attention span; socialization is key.
2.short: Recall, stays, and social calm; add scent games.

3.title: 3rd Barkday — Young adolescent — testing limits is normal
3.expect: Impulse control growing; expect occasional boundary testing.
3.short: Recall, stays, and social calm; add scent games.

4.title: 4th Barkday — Adolescent peak — build consistency
4.expect: Impulse control growing; expect occasional boundary testing.
4.short: Recall, stays, and social calm; add scent games.

5.title: 5th Barkday — Early adult — refine manners
5.expect: Prime learning window; habits cement quickly—good or bad.
5.short: Proof cues; nosework & conditioning keep things sharp.

6.expect: Prime learning window; habits cement quickly—good or bad.

10.title: 10th Barkday — Mature adult — protect joints, keep brain busy
10.expect: Energy steady; protect joints and keep the brain engaged.
10.short: Low‑impact work, longer calm settles, joint warmups.

11.short: Low‑impact work, longer calm settles, joint warmups.

13.title: 13th Barkday — Early senior — shorter, richer sessions
13.expect: Slight slowdown; shorter focused sessions work best.
13.short: Short, rich sessions; gentle puzzles & balance work.
